title: Spicy Salmon Crunch Sushi Roll
directions: Wrap bamboo mat in plastic wrap.
Place nori sheet shiny-side down on the mat.
Spread sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving a 1-inch strip at the top.
Lay salmon slices and avocado slices across the center of the rice.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat, tucking the filling as you go.
Drizzle spicy mayo over the top of the roll.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and optional tempura flakes for crunch.
Wet a sharp knife and slice the roll into 6-8 pieces using a single clean downward motion. Wet the knife between each cut.
notes: This is the 'fancy' roll - save it for last when you are warmed up from rolling the simpler ones. The spicy mayo and sesame seeds elevate it to restaurant-level. Tempura flakes or crushed rice crackers add an optional crunch element.
